playerex.config.client.enablegui: Set to false to disable the custom gui.
playerex.config.common.constitution: Starting Constitution (also starting hp in half hearts) - cannot and should not be set to 0 or less than 0.
playerex.config.common.strength: Starting Strength - cannot and should not be set to less than 0.
playerex.config.common.dexterity: Starting Dexterity - cannot and should not be set to less than 0.
playerex.config.common.intelligence: Starting Intelligence - cannot and should not be set to less than 0.
playerex.config.common.luckiness: Starting Luckiness - cannot and should not be set to less than 0.
